metadata.title: CVE-2017-5195 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Irssi 0.8.17 before 0.8.21 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds read and crash) via a crafted ANSI x8 color code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5195` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.3').
